page.title: 07LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Our survey tried to show what type of leisure activities people enjoyed the most. We found the most popular activ- ities were swimming{22%}, walking for pleasure{21%}, reading{17%}and aero- bics and keep fit{17%}, all cheap and relaxing. The facilities for these are easily available. The swimming baths are in the town. The other things people enjoy are music, keepfit, golf, cycling, football, snooker, squash, knitting, dancing, rock hunting, gym nastics, gardening, boating, riding, tennis, running, pool, volley ball, fishing, water sports, hockey, ski- ing, skating, and karate. When asked about their favourite sport{65%}of the people watch their leisure on T.V. {14% }of people watch their sport live,{21%}did not specify live or on T.V. So many people watch their sport on T.V. probably because it is cheap.
